remarks: Double the terms.  Since doubling is the same as negation, this can be viewed as a contraposition inference.  (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 17-Nov-2007.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nic-idbl.1 $e |- ( ph -/\ ( ps -/\ ps ) ) $.
nic-idbl $p |- ( ( ps -/\ ps ) -/\ ( ( ph -/\ ph ) -/\ ( ph -/\ ph ) ) ) $.
